subActionTranslation.Entry: Warp in at Beginning of Match
subActionTranslation.CaptureJump: Broke out of Grab into Air

eventNotes.0x01: Synchronous Timer|Pauses the current flow of events until the set frame is reached. Synchronous timers count down when they are reached in the events list.
eventNotes.0x02: Asynchronous Timer|Pauses the current flow of events until the set frame is reached. Asynchronous Timers start counting from the beginning of the animation.
eventNotes.0x03: Set Loop|Set loop for X iterations.
eventNotes.0x04: Execute Loop|Executes the previously set loop.
eventNotes.0x05: Subroutine|Enter the event routine specified and return after ending.
eventNotes.0x07: GoTo|Goto the event location specified and execute.
0x0B: 1 - Possibly able to hit something that 0 can't?
2 - Able to hit any hitboxes while on the ground, and projectiles on ground or in air.

3 - Able to hit any hitboxes while on the ground, and projectiles on ground or in air. Will go into the rebound animation if it collides with a hitbox thats current damage is less than 9 stronger or weaker than its own damage.
eventNotes.0x12: Random Smash SFX|Generates a random smash sound effect from a pre-defined table of specific sounds.
eventNotes.0x13: Auto-cancel|Toggle the capability for this move to be (or not be) auto-canceled from this point on. 0 = on, 1 = off.
eventNotes.0x14: Reverse Direction|Reverse the direction the character is facing. Also seems to have something to do with throws/item tosses, as well as noting breakpoints for rapid jabs.
eventNotes.0x17: Allow Interrupt|Allow the current action to be interrupted by another action from this point on. Essentially this is what allows for IASA frames.
0x1A: Set Body Collision State|Controls whether or not the character's body is interactable.
eventNotes.0x1F: Changle Model State|Updates the visibility of a model part to show or hide it.
0x22: Throw|This can be configured to either be a throw or a grab release.
eventNotes.0x33: Self Damage|Inflicts damage to yourself, like Pichu.
eventNotes.0x34: Continuation Control|0 = earliest next, 1 = ?, 3 = open continuation window?
eventNotes.0x38: Start Smash Charge|Start charging a smash attack on this frame if the Attack button is still being held. Effects on the character while charging can also be altered.

Kp: This value gets subtracted from knockback taken and applies no knockback if final value is less than or equal to 0. Presumably always active?
The game checks if B is held or not every this many frames
Only recharges outside of Flame Breath usage
Only recharges outside of Flame Breath usage
Smaller values result in larger graphics

Koopa Klaw|Maximum X-axis wiggle of held opponent
Koopa Klaw|Maximum y-axis wiggle of held opponent

Negative values make Bowser rise and vice versa
Grounded and aerial versions are inversely affected; i.e. higher values make grounded turning easier but aerial turning becomes more difficult
Number of frames before this move can be used again
Negative values make aerial version skyrocket; grounded version affected after initial jump
